parts.speaker: Ruby
parts.text: Hey dad. I was thinking about traveling with some friends to Hetia. Do you think you could lend me some money? Please...

options.text: Definitely not. You are not going anywhere.
Sure. How much do you need?
I'll discuss it with your mother.

parts.speaker: Ruby
parts.text: God, you don't need to be so harsh! Whatever, I'll find my own way.

parts.speaker: Ruby
parts.text: Really?! Thank you so much, let me check and I'll let you know.

parts.speaker: Ruby
parts.text: I really want to go, I swear I'm responsible enough... Please!

options.text: You can't speak to me like that! You are grounded for today.
We only care about your safety.
